name: The Subway Nightmare
description:
Story:

You are a writer looking for the next big scoop. When you come across some information regarding a subway system that was shut down with no leading research to go off of. Thinking it is a piece of cake, you willingly go check it out to learn more information about the incidents that happened.

Controls:

WASD -  Move

E -  Interact

F -  Flashlight

Shift - Sprint

Developer Notes:

I am very proud of this project because this is the very first horror game I have ever made! I hope you enjoy this project I have been working on!
